response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring durability and performance beyond your imagination. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. To secure this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at an exclusive price of $15,000. This special offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 15000}
